.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.1.0 (2020-12-09)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.

0.2.0 (2021-02-19)
++++++++++++++++++

* Refactored to include references without DOI.
* New routine to determine publication year from different fields.
* Publications without year data are set to the source DOI year.
